main event: In September 1956, there was a UFO sighting in Dallas, Texas involving a star-shaped object that changed from white to red. The object was stationary at 20,000 ft for 20 minutes before moving west at about 200 knots. The observation lasted for 23 minutes.
interesting points: The object was initially stationary at 20,000 ft for 20 minutes before moving west at a notable speed.
It was described as a star-shaped object, the size of a dime, which changed from white to red.
The report suggests that it could have been an astro-body due to prevailing winds and the object's disappearance at 30,000 ft.
The sighting lasted for 23 minutes, providing a substantial observation period.
Technical intelligence by Wright Patterson confirmed the object was real.
sighted object: star-shaped object changing from white to red
